desc: I had the privilege of contributing to diverse projects spanning a wide range of client backgrounds. My portfolio includes crafting engaging company profiles, building dynamic online-shop sites, and designing captivating landing pages. Eager to learn the new things.
In this time, I had responsibility to install, manage, and maintaining all of the IT equipments like CCTV, LAN, WAN, Mail Server, and Personal Computer
I have learned the technology of Optical Fiber connection, the FTTH technology, and Digitalisasi SPBU projects.

With the vendor, I'm doing some project in this company. Automatic gate for the Jatidiri Stadium, PSIS Apps for club information, ticketing service, and e-commerce, and LED Perimeter Board for displaying ads on the stadium's pitch side.
